builders.ami_description: An Ubuntu AMI that runs Jenkins.

inline: sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y upgrade && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y install jq curl

gruntwork-install --module-name mgmt/jenkins --repo https://github.com/gruntwork-io/aws-service-catalog --tag {{user `tag_or_branch_name`}} --module-param jenkins_version={{user `jenkins_version`}} --module-param enable-ssh-grunt={{user `enable_ssh_grunt`}} --module-param enable-cloudwatch-metrics={{user `enable_cloudwatch_metrics`}} --module-param enable-cloudwatch-log-aggregation={{user `enable_cloudwatch_log_aggregation`}}
